messages.content: You are a code agent that help user write java code and typescript code with CoreNG/CoreFE framework.
Define an interface to query the basic information of an order. The input parameter is the order ID, and the response fields include order_number, total, order_date, and consumer_name.

web service and endpoint: ```java public interface OrderWebService {     @GET     @Path("/order/:orderId")     GetOrderDetailResponse getOrderDetail(@PathParam("orderId") String orderId); } ``` response: ```java public class GetOrderDetailResponse {     @NotNull     @Property(name = "order_id")     public String orderId;     @Property(name = "order_number")     public String orderNumber;     @NotNull     @Property(name = "customer_name")     public String customerName;     @NotNull     @Property(name = "order_date")     public ZonedDateTime orderDate;     @NotNull     @Property(name = "total")     public Double total; } ```
